    <span id="ctl00_MainContent_DetailedOutput"><h1 class="title">Ice Linnorm</h1>The ice linnorm dwells amid glacial crevasses, atop wind-blasted mountain peaks, or within glittering caverns carved from the hearts of the mightiest of icebergs.<br /><br /><b><u><a href="Skills.aspx?ID=5&General=true">Recall Knowledge - Dragon</a></u> (<u><a href="Skills.aspx?ID=2">Arcana</a></u>)</b>: DC 38<h1 class="title"><a href="Monsters.aspx?ID=285">Ice Linnorm</a><span style="float:right;">Creature 17</span></h1><a target="_blank" href="Images\Monsters\Linnorm_IceLinnorm.png"><img class="thumbnail" src="Images\Monsters\Linnorm_IceLinnorm.png"></a><span alt="Uncommon Trait" class="traituncommon" title="Something of uncommon rarity requires special training or comes from a particular culture or part of the world. Some character choices give access to uncommon options, and the GM can choose to allow access for anyone. Less is known about uncommon creatures than common creatures. They typically can’t be summoned. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to these creature is increased by 2."><a href="Traits.aspx?ID=159">Uncommon</a></span><span alt="Chaotic Evil" class="traitalignment" title="Chaotic Evil">CE</span><span alt="Gargantuan" class="traitsize" title="Gargantuan">Gargantuan</span><span alt="Cold Trait" class="trait" title="Effects with this trait deal cold damage. Creatures with this trait have a connection to magical cold."><a href="Traits.aspx?ID=27">Cold</a></span><span alt="Dragon Trait" class="trait" title="Dragons are reptilian creatures, often winged or with the power of  flight. Most are able to use a breath weapon and are immune to sleep and paralysis."><a href="Traits.aspx?ID=50">Dragon</a></span><br /><b>Source</b> <a href="https://paizo.com/products/btq01y0m?Pathfinder-Bestiary" target="_blank" class="external-link"><i>Bestiary pg. 225</i></a><br /><b>Perception</b> +29; darkvision, scent (imprecise) 60 feet, <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Spells.aspx?ID=344"><i>true seeing</i></a><br /><b>Languages</b> <a href="Languages.aspx?ID=13"><u>Aklo</a></u>, <a href="Languages.aspx?ID=2"><u>Draconic</a></u>, <a href="Languages.aspx?ID=10"><u>Sylvan</a></u><br /><b>Skills</b> <a href="Skills.aspx?ID=1"><u>Acrobatics</a></u> +28, <a href="Skills.aspx?ID=3"><u>Athletics</a></u> +32<br /><b>Str</b> +9, <b>Dex</b> +5, <b>Con</b> +7, <b>Int</b> -3, <b>Wis</b> +6, <b>Cha</b> +7<hr /><b>AC</b> 41, <b>Fort</b> +32, <b>Ref</b> +28, <b>Will</b> +27; +1 status to all saves vs. magic<br /><b>HP</b> 330 (regeneration 10 (deactivated by cold iron)); <b>Immunities</b> cold, curse, paralyzed, sleep; <b>Weaknesses</b> cold iron 15, fire 10<br /><b>Curse of Frost</b> (<a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Traits.aspx?ID=27">cold</a>, <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Traits.aspx?ID=38">curse</a>, <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Traits.aspx?ID=134">primal</a>) When a creature slays an ice linnorm, it must succeed at a DC 40 Will save or permanently gain weakness to cold 15.<br /> <b>Attack of Opportunity</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Reaction" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\Reaction.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Reaction" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\Reaction_I.png"> Tail only.<hr /><b>Speed</b> 35 feet, fly 100 feet, swim 40 feet; <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Spells.aspx?ID=128"><i>freedom of movement</i></a><br /><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Melee</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction_I.png"> jaws +34 (<a href="Traits.aspx?ID=192"><u>reach 25 feet</a></u>, <a href="Traits.aspx?ID=103"><u>magical</a></u>), <b>Damage</b> 3d12+17 piercing plus ice linnorm venom</span><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Melee</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction_I.png"> claw +34 (<a href="Traits.aspx?ID=192"><u>reach 20 feet</a></u>, <a href="Traits.aspx?ID=170"><u>agile</a></u>, <a href="Traits.aspx?ID=103"><u>magical</a></u>), <b>Damage</b> 3d8+17 slashing</span><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Melee</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction_I.png"> tail +34 (<a href="Traits.aspx?ID=192"><u>reach 25 feet</a></u>, <a href="Traits.aspx?ID=170"><u>agile</a></u>, <a href="Traits.aspx?ID=103"><u>magical</a></u>), <b>Damage</b> 3d6+17 bludgeoning plus Improved Grab</span><b>Primal Innate Spells</b> DC 38; <b>Constant</b> <b>(8th)</b> <i><u><a href="Spells.aspx?ID=128">freedom of movement</a></u></i>; <b>(7th)</b> <i><u><a href="Spells.aspx?ID=344">true seeing</a></u></i><br /><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Breath Weapon</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Two Actions" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\TwoActions.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Two Actions" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\TwoActions_I.png">  (<a href="Traits.aspx?ID=27"><u>cold</a></u>, <a href="Traits.aspx?ID=65"><u>evocation</a></u>, <a href="Traits.aspx?ID=134"><u>primal</a></u>) The ice linnorm spews out a blast of freezing, viscous ooze in a 60-foot cone that deals 15d6 cold damage to creatures within the area (DC 38 basic Reflex save). The freezing ooze clings to those struck and hardens into thick sheets of ice. A creature that fails the saving throw is <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Conditions.aspx?ID=24">immobilized</a> by the ice until it succeeds at a check to Escape or it or an ally Forces Open the ice (DC 34 for either case). At the start of its turn, a creature still immobilized by the ice takes 4d6 cold damage. Another creature can free a frozen target by dealing a total of 20 fire damage to the frozen target. Left unattended, the ice crumbles away in 1 minute on its own. Creatures with the fire trait can’t be frozen in place by this breath weapon. Flying creatures fall if frozen, and swimming creatures that are frozen rise toward the surface of the water at a speed of 60 feet per round. An ice linnorm can’t use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds.</span><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Constrict</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction_I.png">  2d6+18 bludgeoning, DC 38</span><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Ice Linnorm Venom</b> (<a href="Traits.aspx?ID=27"><u>cold</a></u>, <a href="Traits.aspx?ID=97"><u>injury</a></u>, <a href="Traits.aspx?ID=126"><u>poison</a></u>) <b>Saving Throw</b> DC 38 Fortitude; <b>Maximum Duration</b> 10 rounds; <b>Stage 1</b> 5d6 cold damage and <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Conditions.aspx?ID=10">drained 1</a>; <b>Stage 2</b> 7d6 cold damage and <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Conditions.aspx?ID=10">drained 2</a>.</span><h2 class="title">All Monsters in "<a href="MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=69">Linnorm</a>"</h2><table class="inner"><tr><td><b>Name</b></td><td><b>Level</b></td></tr><tr><td><a href="Monsters.aspx?ID=284">Crag Linnorm</a></td><td>14</td></tr><tr><td><a href="Monsters.aspx?ID=285">Ice Linnorm</a></td><td>17</td></tr><tr><td><a href="Monsters.aspx?ID=286">Tarn Linnorm</a></td><td>20</td></tr><tr><td><a href="Monsters.aspx?ID=287">Tor Linnorm</a></td><td>21</td></tr></table><h1 class="title"><a href="MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=69">Linnorm</a></h1><b>Source</b> <a href="https://paizo.com/products/btq01y0m?Pathfinder-Bestiary" target="_blank" class="external-link"><i>Bestiary pg. 224</i></a><br />Immense, primeval dragons of the northern reaches of the world, linnorms hate those they deem to be lesser creatures and seek to inflict as much suffering as possible upon their unfortunate victims. While these serpentine monstrosities might not be the powerful winged dragons most imagine, they nonetheless possess incredible strength and deadly powers that often rival authentic dragon brutality.<h3 class="title"><img alt="Sidebar - Additional Lore" title="Sidebar - Additional Lore" style="height:20px; padding:2px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Icons\Sidebar_2_AdditionalLore.png"> Death Curses</h3>The death curses of the linnorms are often the subjects of tragic sagas, and those who would think themselves vanquishing heroes for slaying a linnorm often meet their dooms soon thereafter, succumbing to these curses well after the death of the linnorm responsible for bestowing it.<h3 class="title"><img alt="Sidebar - Additional Lore" title="Sidebar - Additional Lore" style="height:20px; padding:2px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Icons\Sidebar_2_AdditionalLore.png"> Linnorm Kings</h3>In the storied Lands of the Linnorm Kings, the slaying of a linnorm is traditionally required for those who would claim a nation’s crown. Recently, though, the Linnorm King White Estrid claimed her crown not by slaying a linnorm but by beating it into submission, gaining a powerful and dangerous ally to help secure her rule.<h3 class="title"><img alt="Sidebar - Treasure and Rewards" title="Sidebar - Treasure and Rewards" style="height:20px; padding:2px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Icons\Sidebar_5_TreasureAndRewards.png"> Linnorm Treasure</h3>As with true dragons, linnorms tend to amass immense piles of treasure in their lairs. These hoards consist of the weapons, gear, and belongings of would-be vanquishers more often than minted coins or works of art.<h3 class="title"><img alt="Sidebar - Related Creatures" title="Sidebar - Related Creatures" style="height:20px; padding:2px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Icons\Sidebar_4_RelatedCreatures.png"> Other Linnorms</h3>Linnorms exist in a variety of forms beyond the four detailed here. The gaunt cairn linnorm, the spiny taiga linnorm, and the aquatic fjord linnorm each terrorize their own specific regions of the Material Plane.</span>

    <br />

  <script>
      initiateToggle(document.getElementById('theme-toggle'));
      initializeMenuToggle(document.getElementById('minMaxMenu'));
      var initializeSearch = function (search) {
          var button;
          var text;
          if (search.firstElementChild.classList.contains('search-input'))
              text = search.firstElementChild;
          if (search.lastElementChild.classList.contains('search-input'))
              text = search.lastElementChild;
          if (search.firstElementChild.classList.contains('search-button'))
              button = search.firstElementChild;
          if (search.lastElementChild.classList.contains('search-button'))
              button = search.lastElementChild;

          if (search) {
              search.addEventListener('keypress', function (e) {
                  if (e.keyCode == 13) {
                      e.preventDefault();
                      if (text.value != null && text.value.length > 0)
                          window.location = window.location.origin + "/Search.aspx?query=" + text.value;
                  }
              })
          }
          if (button) {
              button.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
                  window.location = window.location.origin + "/Search.aspx?query=" + text.value;
              });
          }
      };
      var initializeExpand = function (toggle) {
          var targetAttrString = "[data-target='" + toggle.dataset.toggle + "']";
          //target = menu to be collapsed
          var target = document.querySelector(targetAttrString);
          toggle.addEventListener('click', function () {
              var expanded = target.classList.contains('expanded');
              expanded = !expanded;
              if (expanded) {
                  //hide other in group if exists
                  if (target.dataset.group) {
                      var otherExpanded = document.querySelector('.expanded[data-group="' + target.dataset.group + '"]');
                      if (otherExpanded) {
                          otherExpanded.classList.remove('expanded');
                      }
                  }
                  target.classList.add('expanded');
              } else {
                  target.classList.remove('expanded');
              }
          });
      };
      (function () {
          //toggles = link that expands/collapses target
          var toggles = document.querySelectorAll('[data-toggle]');
          toggles.forEach(function (toggle) {
              initializeExpand(toggle);
          });
          //searches
          var searches = document.querySelectorAll('.search');
          searches.forEach(function (search) {
              initializeSearch(search);
          });
      })();
  </script>
